name: MLUpdateProgressEvent
desc: A type of event during a model update task.

items.name: static var trainingBegin: MLUpdateProgressEvent
items.desc: An event that represents the start of training.

items.name: static var miniBatchEnd: MLUpdateProgressEvent
items.desc: An event that represents the end of a mini-batch within a training epoch.

items.name: static var epochEnd: MLUpdateProgressEvent
items.desc: An event that represents the end of training epoch.

items.name: init(rawValue: Int)
items.desc: Creates a progress event for the given integer.
